parameters.name: FrontendPort
parameters.description: The forwarding port to query. Valid values: **0** to **65535**.

parameters.name: FrontendProtocol
parameters.description:
The type of the forwarding protocol to query. Valid values:

*   **tcp**
*   **udp**

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the instance to query.

> You can call the [DescribeInstanceIds](~~157459~~) operation to query the IDs of all instances.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. For example, if you want to obtain results on the first page, set the value to **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.
